SEARCH
Package compass.http

Class HTTPServer<E extends Session>

java.lang.Object
compass.http.HTTPServer<E>
Type Parameters:
E - session type when using sessions. Default use Session
public class HTTPServer<E extends Session> extends Object
Simple java http server.
Since:
3/30/2023

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    HTTPServer(int port)
    Creates an HTTP port on given port
    HTTPServer(int port, int threads)
    Creates and HTTP port on given port with given amount of threads to listen for.

    • HTTPServer

      public HTTPServer(int port, int threads)
      Creates and HTTP port on given port with given amount of threads to listen for.
      Parameters:
      port - port number
      threads - max number of threads to start
